description: This track log shows a 10km 1-way hike to the NW "base" of Mt. Severide from the Twin Lakes Trailhead.  Be aware of limited water sources after leaving the Twin Lakes.
directions: This trailhead is the Twin Lakes Trailhead.  I'm not sure of how to proceed up  Mt. Severide from where I U-turned (the southern end of this track log)...I  believe it's on the Eastern side.  Any additions/comments are welcome.  This  was a "scouting" tour.  Enjoy!
title: Twin Lakes Mark Berger
